author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: ت کبری فایز شدی عنقریب دنیا و آنچه در او است مفقود و یبقی العزّة لأحبّآء ربّک العزیز الکریم
translation: Render thanks unto Him Who is the Desire of all worlds for having invested thee with such high honor. Erelong the world and all that is therein shall be as a thing forgotten, and all honor shall belong to the loved ones of thy Lord, the All-Glorious, the Most Bountiful.
